text: Guelph is a city in southern Ontario. It is called the Royal City. It has often been rated as one of Canada's best places to live. This is because it has a low unemployment rate and a low crime rate. In the 2021 census, Guelph had a population of 143,740. Guelph has warm, humid summers that can reach up to and cold winters coming down to .
